column4: I need to rip MP3s in Ubuntu 9.10.  Please help me!!  I don't know how to get the right libraries installed.  This is way too f$cking hard.
Does anyone here rip CDs to MP3?  What app do you use?!?
Audio CD extractor is very good and straightforward

You're talking about soundjuicer, but there are no mp3 libraries.  apparently i have to install LAME, but I can't download from the ubuntu repository and can't figure out what to do.  this is so freaking frustrating
